front.title: Interoperability Report for the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP)

abstract.t: This document provides an interoperability report regarding the Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP), as that technology is specified in RFCs 3920 and 3921 (and their proposed successors). This report specifies both a protocol feature set and a protocol implementation report, in accordance with the concepts and formats proposed by Larry Masinter within the NEWTRK Working Group.
